availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Dr. Charles H. Porter (Marion County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, physician. Spencer County, Kentucky, native. Son of Charles C. Porter and Mary M. Jones Porter. Married to Martha A. Woods Porter in Mercer County in 1846. Druggist in Marion County in 1850. Physician in Marion County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 2, p. 399A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191859.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marion County Marriages, Film #000597759.
